bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Alternative Names ni shui si 溺水死 , [appearance of] death from drowing in water. Pathological Condition of cu si 卒死 , sudden [appearance of] death, resulting from drowning in water. Zhu bing yuan hou lun 諸病源候論 23: 溺死候：人為水所沒溺，水從孔竅入，灌注腑臟，其 氣壅閉，故死 , “The signs of [appearance of] death from drowning : When someone is submerged in water, water will enter his body through the orifices. It pours into the depots and palaces, and blocks the path of qi. Hence he will die”.
